DOC.brief_summary: In this international non-interventional study safety and clinical data concerning the treatment of patients suffering from Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC) will be collected.
DOC.brief_title: Global Investigation of Therapeutic Decisions in Hepatocellular Carcinoma and of Its Treatment With Sorafenib
DOC.criteria: Outpatients with histologically/cytologically documented or radiographically diagnosed unresectable HCC who are candidates for systemic therapy and for whom a decision to treat with Nexavar has been made. Radiographic diagnosis HCC NIS, needs typical findings of HCC by radiographic method i.e. on multidimensional, dynamic CT, CT hepatic arteriography (CTHA)/CT arterial portography (CTAP), or MRI. Patients must have signed an informed consent form Patients must have a life expectancy of at least 8 weeks Exclusion criteria must follow the approved local product information
